title: The Martin Poster
description: While pursuing Carl Martin, Josh is falsely accused of aiding in a jailbreak and the marshal's murder.

roles.char: Man Who Questions Josh About Marshal's Murder

title: Fatal Memory
description: When phony wanted posters put a price on the head of a retired Confederate officer, Colonel Sykes summons Josh Randall to help keep the bounty hunters at bay while also uncovering the person behind the bogus posters.

title: The Bounty
description: A reclusive old man with an Apache bodyguard is wanted for a crime committed long ago. Randall tags along with an overeager bounty hunter to ensure the man is brought back alive.

title: Dead End
description: A rancher hires Randall to bring back a line rider charged with grand theft. The accused man's father accompanies Randall on the trek to the remote shack where the thief is thought to be hiding.

title: Passing of Shawnee Bill
description: Randall is rooked into advancing half the bounty to a man who promises to lead him to the wanted criminal Shawnee Bill, but Bill is closer than Randall thinks and he's not even the only bounty hunter on his trail.

title: The Giveaway Gun
description: A banker with a consuming thirst for vengeance hires Randall to track down the man he believes responsible for his son's death. The man Randall seeks can be identified by his distinctive gun draw.

title: Ransom for a Nun
description: Randall is deputized to transport a ruthless killer to Tucson, but exchanges him for the nun kidnapped by the killer's gang. The nettlesome nun then becomes a thorn in his side as he sets out to recapture his prisoner.

title: Miracle at Pot Hole
description: Randall brings a suspected murderer to Pot Hole, but fears the man won't receive a fair trial when he finds the townspeople in the grip of a power-mad bully who serves as the hanging judge over a kangaroo court.

title: The Fourth Headstone
description: When Josh escorts a beautiful woman to a trial that could see her hang for killing her husband, her lover, and a foreman, she uses all her seductive charm on him.

title: Til Death Do Us Part
description: A woman on the lam for murdering her abusive husband seeks the help of her friend Josh Randall, who is willing to investigate her belief that her husband is still alive and responsible for the wanted posters that have made her a lucrative target for bounty hunters.

title: The Favor
description: Owing a favor to a sheriff, Josh agrees against better judgment to go to the lawless town of Bent Horn to bring back a man wanted for bank robbery and murder.

title: Ricochet
description: Josh sets out to help a heartbroken wife locate her missing husband, but his mission of mercy meets with a resistant and tight-lipped townspeople. The mission becomes desperate when Josh discovers another man is also seeking the missing husband, but with murder in mind.

title: Sheriff of Red Rock
description: Josh is bushwhacked by bounty hunters in cahoots with the local sheriff, who now must keep Josh from blowing the whistle on their illegal but lucrative "bounty game."

roles.char: Sheriff Will Echert, misspelled Eckert in on-screen credits

title: Die by the Gun
description: A sadistic pair of killers hijack the stagecoach Josh is riding with a young prisoner.

title: Rawhide Breed
description: Following an Indian attack on their stagecoach, Randall and an eastern gentleman unaccustomed to the ways of the West must trek to safety across many long, hot miles of hostile Apache territory.

title: Eight Cent Reward
description: On Christmas Eve Randall receives his most daunting assignment yet: bring in Santa Claus.

title: Drop to Drink
description: Thieves are lying in wait to ambush mail carriers and eventually Josh is hired to help insure that the mail will get through. The thieves have news about a $20,000 Diamond Ring that is being delivered which they are waiting for. The trail is through desert country with no water for miles.

title: Rope Law
description: Josh and Brace Logan are met on the range by a group of men who want Logan, Josh's prisoner. When he refuses, he's hit from behind and loses Logan. When he gets to town to file a complaint he is surprised to find the sheriff was the leader of the men and his son was the one who hit him. Josh takes an interest in the case now and is determined to find the truth...especially since the sheriff's son wants to organize a lynching.

title: Six-Up to Bannach
description: Josh needs a ride to Brannach fast in order to stop an unjust hanging. The only mode of transportation available is a coach carrying a load of dynamite with a surly driver who doesn't take well to Josh. He reluctantly agrees to allow Josh and his prisoner to travel with them. There are a number of obstacles on the way to slow them down...a river to pass, a washed out bridge and a prisoner who doesn't want to cooperate.

title: The Spurs
description: A man and a woman shoot an already dead man in a back alley making it look as if she shot him in self defense. Josh Randall arrives in Lordsville looking for Vic Warsaw, a killer he has been trailing. The sheriff informs Randall that Warsaw was shot and killed and has just been buried. Josh discovers that the man was shot by Lucy Fremont the town seamstress. After investigating Warsaw's personal effects Josh begins to suspect that Vic Warsaw may still be alive. He begins to question Lucy Fremont in order to get at the truth.

title: Reunion for a Revenge
description: Several men escape from Yuma Prison with a thirst for revenge against a man named Aben Starr. He works at the Saddle Creek Way Station and Randall shows up there expecting the men to arrive also. Soon two of the escapees do arrive and take Josh and Starr captive while waiting for their partners to show. Before they do a stage rides in carrying a Quaker and his deaf-mute sister. They all wait for the other two men to show up so they can carry out their revenge against Starr.

title: Competition
description: Josh is in town for a bit of vacation when two bounty hunters, Ralph Meadows and Al Jarrett, arrive with a dead man. Their unethical methods offend Josh and he wants nothing to do with them. Josh tries to mind his own business but they think he's waiting for a big score and want in on it. Their constant surveillance soon wears on Josh and he devises a scheme to pit the two against each other.

title: Call Your Shot
description: A grieving father hires Josh Randall to find his murdered son's body, but Josh's search for clues runs up against a cowardly conspiracy of silence.

title: Secret Ballot
description: Randall comes to assist a war buddy in his bid for the town's mayoralty, quickly running afoul of the established political machine and its corrupt mayor and sheriff.

title: The Corner
description: A bounty hunter is not a hero in his own hometown, as Josh learns when he honors a dying friend's request to return his body to Cameron and the townspeople rush to judgment, believing Josh killed him for the reward money.

title: Eager Man
description: Josh is approached by the wife of a wanted man eager to turn himself in peacefully, provided Josh split the bounty with his wife. To ensure the deal goes as planned, Josh enlists the aid of an old friend: Sheriff Pat Garrett.

title: The Legend
description: A man with unwavering faith in a legend about lost treasure hires Josh to lead his family on an expedition into the desert to locate the cache of Spanish gold.

title: Railroaded
description: When a young runaway is framed for killing a Pinkerton agent, Randall turns detective to uncover the real killer.

title: Double Fee
description: Josh uncovers an unconventional kidnapping plot when he signs on to rescue the ransomed sister of a famous singer.

title: The Kovack Affair
description: Josh comes to the aid of his old friend Jesse, who is being strong-armed into selling the Outrider Hotel by self-proclaimed mayor and town bully Peter Kovack.

title: Bounty for a Bride
description: A decidedly different and dangerous assignment awaits Josh when he agrees to go into the Apache camp and compete in their contests to win the hand of a white woman the Indians kidnapped as a child and have raised as their own.

title: Crossroads
description: Pursuing killer Joe Collins into the Superstition Mountains, Josh is shadowed by a man who believes Collins could be his long lost son.

title: Angels of Vengeance
description: A violent religious cult cast lots and it falls upon a young woman to act as its angel of vengeance. Her mission is to murder Josh Randall in retaliation for his killing their cult leader's son in a shootout.

title: Littlest Client
description: Josh is hired by a young orphan girl to find the parents she insists are still alive and with whom she yearns to be reunited.

title: The Conquerors
description: A concerned father hires Josh to retrieve his son, a passionate young ideologue whose gift for rousing rhetoric is being used by plunderers to recruit freedom fighters to serve in their phony liberation of Baja California.

title: Amos Carter
description: Josh's big talk lands him in big trouble when his browbeating the locals about ending the decades-long Carter-Blake feud gets him drafted to go reconcile the hate-fueled hillbillies.

title: Montana Kid
description: To track down tinhorn gambler Johnny Deuce, Randall befriends the card sharp's stepson and protégé, a twelve-year-old orphan boy and card cheat in training nicknamed The Montana Kid.

title: The Healing Woman
description: Josh embarks on a mission of mercy when he pleads with the parents of a boy with appendicitis to let the doctor operate. The father, embittered against modern medicine, trusts only the local witch to cure his son's sickness.

title: The Matchmaker
description: Josh reluctantly accepts an offbeat assignment: finding a beautiful bride for his bashful buddy Charlie, the homeliest man in the West.

title: Breakout
description: Josh in a federal prison plotting the great escape? The government employs Randall to portray an escaped prisoner in order to trick his cellmate into leading authorities to the $50,000 he stole and stashed away in a secret location.

title: Estralita
description: After Randall rescues Jake Pringle from a lynch mob's rope, he learns he's not the only one with an invested interest in keeping the killer alive.

title: The Hostage
description: Who needs enemies with friends like the residents of Rogue City, who celebrate Randall for bringing in notorious killer Jumbo Kane, but just as quickly turn on Josh when Kane breaks loose and demands a hostage to ensure his escape.

title: The Empty Cell
description: Randall is rooked out of his bounty by crafty criminal Hunt Willis and his accomplice. Not one to accept defeat, Josh turns detective to rout the outlaws, his investigation dogged by the suspicious sheriff, a cousin to Willis.

title: Bad Gun
description: Against better judgment, Josh serves as guide for a dandified East Coast gun salesman who comes west to retrieve and replace a defective gun he sold to notorious outlaw Curly Bill Brocius.

title: The Tyrant
description: On the trail of a Cavalry deserter and the horses he stole, Josh rides into a town ruled as the private fiefdom of its autocratic, psychopathic marshal.

title: Reckless
description: Hired by a father to bring back the man who killed his son Josh is surprised when he doesn't get paid because he brought the man back alive. He pursues the matter to make sure that the father's hate isn't allowed to kill an innocent man.

title: Desert Seed
description: Josh attempts to bring a man back for murder. He has to outwit the man's nephew and 2 men bent on claiming the bounty. Josh kills the 2 men and proves to the nephew that he can be trusted to get his uncle back to stand trial for a crime committed in self-defense.

title: Twelve Hours to Crazy Horse
description: Josh brings a wanted man in, only to find he killed the sheriff's brother. they take the man to Crazy Horse for trial and along the way the man escapes. Josh saves the sheriff by killing the man.

title: No Trail Back
description: Josh is looking for a man who, while trying to rob a bank, is bitten by a rabid dog. Josh ends up shooting the man's brother, also an outlaw, and gets the man to a doctor to save him.

title: Man on Horseback
description: A man shoots his brother over ownership of their property and blames it on an Indian who reclaimed his furs from him. Josh finds the Indian and they work together to bring the man to justice.

title: Chain Gang
description: Josh is captured by a corrupt deputy and is forced by the sheriff to work on a chain gang. With the help of other members of the chain gang, Josh brings the culprits to western justice.

title: Vanishing Act
description: Randall is tracking a magician who, along with two other guys, robs banks. When Randall catches him, he turns him over to the sheriff, but the man escapes. So Randall tracks him down and is shot but keeps the man and his daughter at bay. Later the accomplices show up, demanding that they're going to do things their way from now on.

title: Mental Lapse
description: Josh plays detective when he signs on to help an amnesiac discover his identity.

title: Angela
description: A grieving daughter impatient with the slow-moving wheels of justice vows to bring vengeance upon the man who murdered her father.

title: The Monster
description: Josh is determined to debunk the dire menace posed by a marauding monster that has smashed mining camps, decimated an Indian village and that has the residents of nearby Nugget City hiding behind locked doors.

title: Most Beautiful Woman
description: Josh, down on his luck, hires out for $100/day to find a woman - one catch is she may be dead.

title: Jason
description: Jason brings in "Doc" Phillips hoping he can lure Clell Fanning out as he has an old score to settle with Clell. He is shot by one of Clell's henchman and he must rely on the deputy, Nichols, who takes over after the Sheriff is killed.

title: The Partners
description: Josh is arrested on a bogus horse-stealing charge. Jason shows up to get him out of jail and together they kill 3 brothers wanting revenge against Josh for killing their brother.

title: Tolliver Bender
description: To net a thousand-dollar reward, Josh saves Tolliver Bend from a hanging so he can testify in a nearby trial. Double-crosses are immediately hatched by those who want Tolliver dead and by those who want the money.

title: Black Belt
description: Josh and Jason are on the trail of a karate expert accused of killing his employer, but someone wants him brought in dead.

title: The Pariah
description: Randall learns "hate comes high" in a town whose people have hired a trio of killers to murder their fellow resident Randy Holleran, a sniveling drunkard whom Josh has promised to protect.

title: The Inheritance
description: A dying man offers Josh $2000 to find his son, who ran away from home 15 years ago.

title: Prison Trail
description: Josh and Jason are escorting four prisoners to Levenworth prison when a stranger begins following along behind.

title: The Trial
description: Four ex-army personnel stage a illegal mock trial accusing their former lieutenant of dereliction of duty.

title: The Cure
description: Josh performs an intervention on the most eligible drunk in town, so the care-free alcoholic will appear respectable to his wealthy brother Al Simmons, when he arrives from staid Philadelphia. After 15 years apart, Harry Simmons couldn't care less, but homely store-owner Emily hopes to trick Harry into marriage, as part of his makeover. So she pays Josh a hefty bounty on Harry: Wanted Dead or Sober.

title: Journey for Josh
description: Josh and the beautiful female prisoner he is transporting to trial, fall in love with each other, but horrible tragedy awaits when the woman's evil male partner follows.

title: The Looters
description: Three dangerous prisoners escape from jail and appoint themselves the law, after the town is hit by a tornado that kills the sheriff.

title: To the Victor
description: Josh is hired to convince the women of the town to come back to their men when they leave demanding that all towns men give up their guns for good.

title: Criss Cross
description: A well meaning Dr. pays an innocent man to take the blame for his son's robbery, but the son sets out to kill the man to make sure he never tells.

title: Witch Woman
description: In Mexico, Josh protects a sensible man and his pregnant wife from the villagers who are angered when he throws the town "witch" off his property.

title: Epitaph
description: When a good sheriff is seduced into robbing a bank by his beautiful but deadly girlfriend, he convinces Josh to let him assist in her capture.

title: The Voice of Silence
description: Josh protects a beautiful deaf, mute, teenage girl from men who want her father's stolen money that he hid before serving time in prison.

title: El Gato
description: Josh escorts an East Coast photographer to take a picture his friend El Gato (The Cat), who is a famous, hilarious bandit living in the hills of Mexico with a small army.

title: Detour
description: Josh is hired by a fearful man to help him marry his sweetheart, the daughter of a local rancher. The girl's father is vehemently opposed to the marriage and hence the necessity for Josh to get involved.

title: Monday Morning
description: Josh takes a job protecting an express office employee who stole $10,000 and wants to return it before it's discovered missing.

title: The Long Search
description: A Japanese woman travels to the U.S. to find the American man who proposed to her and is confronted by the Japanese man to whom she had been promised. Traditional Japanese garb, rituals and a full tea a ceremony make for an unusual episode.

title: Dead Reckoning
description: A woman wants Josh to bring in her wanted husband alive, so he can prove self defense, but the brothers of the man he killed are out to hang him.

title: Barney's Bounty
description: When Josh's 2 bounty prisoners escape taking 2 horses from his horse trader friend, he helps in tracking them down.
